name: CreaJam More Is Worse
description:
CreaJam More Is Worse

Our first Créajeu game jam. More is Worse is a small platformer made in 2 days by 4 people. Made with Godot. All assets were made by us during the game jam.

Play

Collect tokens, but more is ... worse.

Usual platformer controls (arrows, or ZQSD for french keyboards).

Don't forget double jump.
